channel.title: How to set up jdk on rscd?
channel.description: I got everything else but I was reading guide for the divinepk source and it's different from the rscd source here.

item.title: How to set up jdk on rscd?
item.dc:creator: @bigh51 bigh51
item.description:
@bigh51 wrote:

[quote=“Lux, post:5, topic:234578”][quote author=sykotic link=topic=309288.msg2471501#msg2471501 date=1223009105]
Nvm sorry guys, i got it. Yeah you edit the file. silly me.

I can’t get it to run though, i guess ill wait for my friend to get online 2marrow to help me.
[/quote]

Yeah, I downloaded the RSCD source and I successfully got the JDK connected and all… but I wasn’t able to get the .sql connected to WAMP. Some kind of error, of which my Java skills are a bit too lacking, heh. I noticed it when I went to run the ‘run_server.bat’ and it sat there trying to connect to the ls server. Which I believe to be the connection between the .sql to the WAMP server.[/quote]No, ls is the loginserver. You have to start run_ls, then run… All you do with wamp is have it running, create the db, and import the .sql file…

Read full topic
item.source: How to set up jdk on rscd?

item.title: How to set up jdk on rscd?
item.dc:creator: @Lux Lux
item.description:
@Lux wrote:

[quote=“sykotic, post:4, topic:234578”]Nvm sorry guys, i got it. Yeah you edit the file. silly me.

I can’t get it to run though, i guess ill wait for my friend to get online 2marrow to help me.[/quote]

Yeah, I downloaded the RSCD source and I successfully got the JDK connected and all… but I wasn’t able to get the .sql connected to WAMP. Some kind of error, of which my Java skills are a bit too lacking, heh. I noticed it when I went to run the ‘run_server.bat’ and it sat there trying to connect to the ls server. Which I believe to be the connection between the .sql to the WAMP server.
